Major Childhood Cancer Prevention Legislation was signed into law! The STAR (Survivorship, Treatment, Access, and Research) Reauthorization Act -- a bill I led with Reps. Michael McCaul (R-Texas), G K Butterfield (D-NC), and Jackie Speier (D-Calif.)

What a weird name to be used in Washington. I wish we could stop playing this game of who struck John.

The bill prohibits the sale and export of crude oil from the United States Strategic Petroleum Reserve (SPR) to any entity which is under the ownership, control, or influence of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP). Further, the bill requires that the Department of Energy require as a condition of any sale of crude oil from the SPR, that such oil not be exported to China.

President Biden has flat out ignored the crisis at our Southern border over the last two years. Northern border encounters are up 1,500% from the day he took office. [[user]] just passed the Secure The Border Act to do exactly that -- secure our borders! [[url]]
